tpk::KernelFK5RefSys

tpk::KernelFK5RefSys Class Reference

#include <KernelFK5RefSys.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::KernelFK5RefSys:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

International Celestial Reference System.

The implementation of all the tcspk interface method are inherited from TcspkRefSys.

sky vector
